text: Chen Chien-jen (, born 6 June 1951) is a Taiwanese epidemiologist and politician. He has been the premier of the Republic of China (Taiwan) since 2023. He was the Vice President of Taiwan from 2016 to 2020. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of the Republic of China on Taiwan Category:Vice presidents of the Republic of China on Taiwan
title: Chen Chien-jen
